attributes.action: Stop bottom trawler fishing to allow fish stocks to grow again
attributes.additional_details:
By banning trawling for a couple of years, this will allow our fish stocks to recover and give time for sustainable options to be considered in the future.

https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&url=https://oceana.org/sites/default/files/reports/Trawling_BZ_10may10_toAudrey.pdf&ved=2ahUKEwiE1MbUjKDiAhVGQxUIHeYrDIUQFjALegQIAxAB&usg=AOvVaw3wZ2Gjy3DWRMEGi3nWM2_o
https://www.google.com/amp/s/amp.theguardian.com/environment/2014/feb/10/bottom-trawling-how-to-empty-the-seas

Just look at Google and see what destruction and implications it has on our oceans.
attributes.background: Bottom trawler fishing is so destructive to our oceans, it doesn't pick what marine creature it catches, bottom trawler nets literally drag the sea bed indiscriminately.
